name: Lumber Defense
description:
Lumber Defense is a fast-paced tower defense in which you have to collect wood to create tools to defend your house.

Survive as long as you can in this endless battle as you unlock awesome items with special abilities.

Instructions:
Prevent the enemies to from reaching your house
Use the crosswalks to cross the streets
Grab turrets to move them
Cut down trees to get wood
Use wood to buy more weapons, perks and trees
The best way to get wood is with bought trees, plant them!

Controls:
WASD: Move
Space: Grab, Drop, Chop
Tab: Store
E:  Activate Special Defenses
Q: Upgrade Weapons

This game was made using assets from:
images, models, sounds: https://www.kenney.nl/
character model: pinkcannon
music: Spring
Heavy cannon model: nazzyc
icons: Freepik, mynamepong
